original_title: Immigration & Emigration Dept. issues special notice for passport applicants
original_body_lines: A special notice has been issued to all applicants who have made appointments to hand over their passports to the Department of Immigration & Emigration tomorrow (April 12).
Accordingly, passport applicants are advised to submit their respective applications to the department before 12.00 p.m. tomorrow.
Meanwhile, those who have not made an appointment are urged to refrain from visiting the head office or the regional offices of the department tomorrow.
